title: Strong demand in H2 FY24 to contribute to double-digit revenue growth for hotel industry: ICRA
description: ICRA, an investment information and credit ratings agency, predicts that the hospitality industry in India will experience double-digit revenue growth in fiscal year 2024. This growth will be driven by domestic leisure travel, demand from meetings and conferences, business travel, and an increase in foreign tourist arrivals. ICRA estimates that premium hotel occupancy will reach 70-72% in 2024, with average room rates expected to be around Rs 6,000-6,200. Additionally, the industry has benefited from events like the G20 summit and the ICC World Cup 2023.
